summary: I’ve seen so many posts about Tony Stark playing catch with Peter Parker.
body:
I’ve seen so many posts about Tony Stark playing catch with Peter Parker.

But what if it was Iron Man playing catch with Spider-Man?! Like with the suits and web slingers and everything!! And Spider-Man is doing flips and stuff and throwing the ball super hard because he has super strength, and Iron Man is testing out all the newest features on his suit, and all the civilians are so confused. Like, is this a battle? Training? What is going on here?

And meanwhile, Tony and Peter are just having a blast, unknowingly creating a huge media sensation that Pepper will have to deal with, but she can’t even be mad, because it’s just too cute. And funny.

summary: Huge shoutout to the movie theaters who keep the lights off while the Marvel credits are rolling. You show that you understand...
body: Huge shoutout to the movie theaters who keep the lights off while the Marvel credits are rolling. You show that you understand that the movie is NOT over, and show other movie goers that there is more to come. So thank you.

summary: The Hulk encounters Thanos in the beginning of Avengers: Infinity War and gets tragically defeated by the tactical moves of the...
body:
The Hulk encounters Thanos in the beginning of Avengers: Infinity War and gets tragically defeated by the tactical moves of the Mad Titan. In his dying moments, Heimdall transports The Hulk to Earth. After crash lading in the Sanctum Santorum, Hulk turns back to Banner. Once the Black Order arrives, Bruce discovers he can’t turn back into The Hulk on command.

Here’s a Clip of Bruce Banner attempting to bring out the Hulk in Avengers: Infinity War!

Let’s Un-Box and review the Pop! Marvel Avengers: Infinity War Bruce Banner vinyl figure!

Continue to the review:

“No, not really, but when do I ever get what I want?”

The Pop! Marvel Avengers: Infinity War Bruce Banner comes in a window display box numbered 419.

This figure is part of the second Wave of Pop! Marvel Avengers: Infinity War Vinyl figures, which also includes Groot, Young Gamora and Bucky Barnes.

Funko Pop! Marvel Avengers: Infinity War Wave 2!

“I need to concentrate for a second.”

Here’s the Pop! Marvel Avengers: Infinity War Bruce Banner vinyl figure out of the box. This 3 ¾ inch tall stylized vinyl figure captures a moment from Avengers: Infinity War where Bruce Banner is trying desperately to change into The Hulk!

Funko Pop! Avengers: Infinity War Hulkbuster Review!

“I don’t know, we’re sorta having a thing.”

Here are some more shots of the Pop! Bruce Banner vinyl figure. I think it was an interesting choice to make a figure based on Banner attempting to transform into The Hulk. Bruce Banner’s pose is very dynamic, capturing Banner’s intense frustration with the other half of his persona. The standout feature should really have been the airbrushed looking green paint deco, but unfortunately the execution does not exactly live up to the look of the official image.

Collectible Lookout:

Order the Pop! Marvel Avengers: Infinity War Bruce Banner vinyl figure from Entertainment Earth by using the green button below:

[button-green url=”https://www.entertainmentearth.com/product/FU35776?id=PL-606031421″ target=”_self” position=”Center”]Order Now![/button-green]

Pop! Bruce Banner Picture Review! The Hulk encounters Thanos in the beginning of Avengers: Infinity War and gets tragically defeated by the tactical moves of the…

title: Rumor: Marvel Studios' Black Widow Solo Movie Considered R-Rating
excerpt: A new rumor suggests Marvel really did consider an R-rating for their Black Widow movie.

blog.name: ominousred
blog.title: ominousred
blog.description: Mad appreciation for this Hip Hop Thing. Virtual digging. Traditional digging. Chopping breaks. Layering samples. Programming synths. Remixing songs. Writing thoughts in the form of a poem. Forever chasing great music. Cut, scratch and transforming with finesse. Looking at cars I can't afford. Shopping for Jordans I can't buy. Searching for good food. Production gear lusting. Sharing what I find. Props to those who worked for them...

blog.name: multifandomvids98
blog.title: MultiFandomVids98
blog.description: Why Hello There! Welcome to my blog for my YouTube Channel. I should probably introduce you to my Channel. My Channel contains Fan Made Videos of different kinds of Fandoms. I even do take suggestions, so if there is any particular fandom you want me to make a fan made video of, let me know and I can see what I can do. My YouTube Channel has been up a fair bit so I thought maybe I should make a blog about my channel which would contain ALL of my videos that I upload. I also do have two other blogs which is @GhostAdventuresCrew101 and @VampDarkness98Photography, so you might have already seen the videos. Feel Free to share this blog or my videos around if you wish too. If you have anything to ask or just want to chat, do not shy away. I am willing to answer anything and I also do enjoy talking to people. I only have TWO RULES for this blog and for my videos along side my channel and they are: 1. No negative comments (Which includes: rude, hateful and abusive words) - I want to try and keep this blog and my channel a positive community. And: 2. Be kind to everyone. So I hope you all enjoy this blog and my channel. The link to my channel would be somewhere on this blog. Welcome! And enjoy :)

summary:
Loki Tribute | Time 

Hey ya'll, I know it's been a while since I have uploaded a new video on my channel. So as a late...
caption:
Loki Tribute | Time

Hey ya’ll, I know it’s been a while since I have uploaded a new video on my channel. So as a late Christmas present I present you a Loki Tribute. (Even though he ain’t dead, I mean come on, it’s Loki we’re talking about)

I hope you all enjoy and I know I made a few errors but I hope you all can look past that.

Enjoy :)
